name: Cube Match Triple - 3D Puzzle
description:
Cube Match Triple is a relaxation 3D match game. You can tap and match tiles with swipe to rotate 360 degrees the cube match identical tiles to complete levels. Solve 3D puzzle boards with quick thinking and smart moves to get to the next level.

Let’s play tile master match and craft your skill to become a match master!

How To Play
Simply find and choose 3 same 3D tiles
Swipe to rotate the 3D Cube
Don’t fill up a collection bar
Use the boosters to help you merge those tiles faster and pass tricky levels
Match tiles as quickly to clear all 3D tiles before the time runs out!
Pause it whenever you want, and continue anytime with the auto-saving system

Features:
Many colorful 3D objects & shapes, such as: candy crush, cute animals, cool toys, exciting emojis, appetizing food, fruits, ball, bubble and more exciting objects
Easy and fun to play, challenge mastery
The game has tons of challenging well-designed levels to train your brain
Free to play for adults and kids at the same time!

Enjoy Cube Match Triple now and collect endless fun!
Download this free puzzle game today and Challenge yourself!

if you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us: support@lihuhugames.com
